parameters.name: X-Fc-Account-Id
parameters.description: The list of events that trigger the asynchronous task.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Code-Checksum
parameters.description: The structure of the asynchronous task.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Date
parameters.description: Alibaba Cloud provides SDKs for multiple programming languages to help you integrate Alibaba Cloud services by using APIs. We recommend that you use an SDK to call API operations. This frees you from manual signature verification.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Invocation-Type
parameters.description: StatefulAsyncInvocation: asynchronous task. Asynchronous tasks allow you to manage the states on the basis of common asynchronous invocations, which is more suitable for task scenarios.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Log-Type
parameters.description: The latest version of Function Compute API.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Trace-Id
parameters.description: You can search for API operations, call and debug API operations online, and dynamically generate executable sample code for SDKs.

parameters.name: functionName
parameters.description: The number of retries after the asynchronous task fails.

parameters.name: invocationId
parameters.description: The request ID of the asynchronous task.

parameters.name: qualifier
parameters.description: The ID of the instance that is used to run the asynchronous task.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The event triggered by the asynchronous task.
